TestCase.name: testExpressionReductionWithPythonUDF
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[PyUdf()], EXPR$1=[MyUdf(1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS EXPR$1]) +- PythonCalc(select=[PyUdf() AS f0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testExpressionReductionWithRand
TestCase.Resource: SELECT RAND(), RAND(), RAND(1), RAND(1), RAND_INTEGER(3), RAND_INTEGER(3) FROM MyTable

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[RAND()], EXPR$1=[RAND()], EXPR$2=[RAND(1)], EXPR$3=[RAND(1)], EXPR$4=[RAND_INTEGER(3)], EXPR$5=[RAND_INTEGER(3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[RAND() AS EXPR$0, RAND() AS EXPR$1, RAND(1) AS EXPR$2, RAND(1) AS EXPR$3, RAND_INTEGER(3) AS EXPR$4, RAND_INTEGER(3) AS EXPR$5]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testExpressionReductionWithUDF
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[MyUdf(1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testExpressionReductionWithRichUDF
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[myUdf(1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[11 AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testExpressionReductionWithRichUDFAndInvalidOpen
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[myUdf(+(1, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[myUdf(+(1, 1)) AS EXPR$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
